nodes.metricSQL: SELECT count(metric_value) AS value FROM oracle_dbstatus WHERE _ci_id = 'CI1234' AND application = 'RDBMS' AND oracledb_service = 'ORDPROD' AND metric_name = 'instance_status' AND time > now() - 30m
nodes.metricDetailSQL: SELECT metric_value AS value FROM oracle_dbstatus WHERE _ci_id = 'CI1234' AND application = 'RDBMS' AND oracledb_service = 'ORDPROD' AND metric_name = 'instance_status' AND time > now() - 60m
nodes.metricDetailSQL2: SELECT mean(metric_value) AS value FROM oracle_dbstatus WHERE _ci_id = 'CI1234' AND application = 'RDBMS' AND oracledb_service = 'ORDPROD' AND metric_name = 'instance_status' AND time > now() - 30m GROUP BY time(10m)
